name: Corey Schmid - Mars Fort Lytton
description:
FORT LYTTON MARS BASE VR

In the distant future, space colonist found similar terrain area on Mars to the that of Fort Lytton on Earth. They used the designs and layout of Fort Lytton to create their new secret facility on Mars. Recently the station has had no communication, and you, the player, a member of the Human Defence Force, are ordered to investigate the facility and discover the events that have occurred.

Game was developed for the HTC vive and Steam VR. Feel free to contact me if any issues using the experience.
